Name: Cheatwell Games Fart Card Game
Reviews: Bought as a gift. Simple instructions and she says she and her kids (7 & 9) have had a couple of very enjoyable plays, so it gets a thumbs up from her!
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 September 2023

Name: Cheatwell Games Fart Card Game
Reviews: Very much like Uno. Is good fun to kill half an hour. The sound effects it asks you to make when playing a card isn't realistic and can actually make the game laborious if you choose to follow those rules! But...just play without doing it. Nice tin and it's a bit more refreshing from the more grown up card games.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 April 2022

Reviews: simple entertainment for all.

Name: Cheatwell Games Fart Card Game
Reviews: Bought for Xmas, when I was cooking my son and his Dad played this game. The laughter coming from them both was infectious. We all played a game then which was fun, it’s uno but with farts. Not been played since though so disappointing as seems a one hit wonder game.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 January 2024

Name: Cheatwell Games Fart Card Game
Reviews: Played this Christmas Day with two adults a teenager and five year old grandchildren. The five year old loved it as he is only allowed to say trump not fart so he thought it was great. A lovely little stocking filler would recommend.
